body_html:
@VladimirRoaming I'm also somewhat confused by your description of the problem. Let me attempt to re-phrase the questions I think you're asking:

  1. Are libtensorflow.so and libtensorflow_cc.so intended to be used together, or separately? I.e. is the user allowed to link both into the same binary?

  2. Should we expect that C API symbols are exported via libtensorflow_cc.so? Or should they only be exported via libtensorflow.so?

  3. It seems that the behavior has changed between r1.3 and master on MacOS, possibly due to a651023.

@asimshankar Perhaps you can comment on these questions.
